text: Mehmet Ekşi (born 1 April 1953) is a Turkish former international footballer and manager. ==Style of play== Although his primary position is defender, Ekşi was often deployed in midfield. During his career, Ekşi possessed renown attributes of strength, stamina, timing and aerial capability. ==Achievements== ;Trabzonspor * Süper Lig (1): 1978–79 * Turkish Cup (1): 1977–78, 1983–84 * Turkish Super Cup (1): 1978 ;Beşiktaş * Süper Lig (1): 1981–82 * TSYD Cup (1): 1984 ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable" style="margin:left;" |- !Year!!Title!!Role!!Notes |- | 1981 || Gol Kralı || Himself || Uncredited |- |} ==References== ==External links== *Profile at Turkish Football Federation * Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Association football midfielders Category:Association football defenders Category:Turkish footballers Category:Turkey international footballers Category:Süper Lig players Category:Beşiktaş J.K. footballers Category:Trabzonspor footballers Category:Elazığspor footballers Category:Antalyaspor footballers Category:Turkish football managers Category:Elazığspor managers Category:Kocaelispor managers Category:Sarıyer S.K. managers
title: Mehmet Ekşi
